name: Idle Champions: Wyrm Slayer Ezmerelda Theme Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Ezmerelda (if you don't already have them) Wyrm Slayer Ezmerelda Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Ezmerelda 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Ezmerelda Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards
